attributes.additional_details: This country began metrication in the 1960's. It has got itself into a complete mess in the last 50 years. Australia and New Zealand, in contrast completed metrication in 1980. My wife grew up in NZ and can't believe how back ward we are! We can not go back to being an imperial measurements only, the USA is partly metric, the rest of the world is exclusively metric! Please either finish the job off or at least allow dual units on ALL road signs.
